This dress is very pretty. I love the style and the casual look. The dress is flowy and lightweight and has slip material underneath so it's not see through. It was a nice dress the one time I got to wear it. I wore it once and the elastic in the sleeve broke, I didn't even do anything but take it off so this really shouldn't have happened. I'm upset that I only got one use out of it, making it a big waste of my money. It was nice looking and pretty until I wore it though.
Love this dress! I'm 5'3 145lbs I got the medium. Fits great! Very pretty. Nice fabric, great value
Looked really good was to low cut in front and was returned
A tad pricey for quality but noticeably colorful and cute to wear, and comfy! Runs large. Order smaller size.

Loved the color and print of this dress.  Very comfortable and well made.  I could have probably sized down but I still loved how it fit.
This dress is beautiful and versatile for work and for fun!  Paired with a sweater and high boots it goes from fall to winter (in the South) very easily!
Love it. Het a lot of compliments  on my address and where did I get it.

This dress is absolutely stunning! The floral print is vibrant yet elegant, and the lightweight fabric makes it perfect for any season. I love the smocked elastic waist—it’s super flattering and comfortable, giving a great shape without feeling restrictive. The V-neck adds a touch of femininity, I did throw on a tank under it to avoid showing cleavage at church. The long sleeves make it versatile for cooler weather.  I’ve worn this dress to both brunch and church, and it got so many compliments. True to size, it fits beautifully, and the quality is excellent for the price. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a stylish yet comfy boho vibe!
This dress is really cute and flattering for the right body type.  If you don't have any curves it just hangs and doesn't look very good.
I love this dress so much!!  Only thing missy is pockets!  L
I wish the cut of this worked for my body type. I think you need a smaller chest to make it work. My girls were not having this one which was disappointing because the dress was really nice.

Love this style... it works so well with all heels and boots.  I bought 2 other colors too!
Great versatile dress for fall with boots or spring with wedges. Good quality and true to size. I love the neckline and fit in the waist. Good value.
Loved the way it looked and fit!!! Surprised with the quality!!
I needed a pretty floral fall dress for an event and this one was perfect. It fits true to size and is flattering.
Lots of cleavage. Very tight around chest area.
Love this dress and planning on purchasing more colors. The fit and fabric is as expected, color is vibrant, and overall a great dress.
This is the cutest dress. It’s so flattering, I don’t need spanx and it’s lightweight so works great year round in the south. Highly recommend!

this dress is a lightweight dress. The only negative is that it is too low in the front for my preference. But I love the colors and the way it flows.

评论概述: Dokotoo Womens Dresses 2024 Boho Floral V Neck Long Sleeve Smocked Elastic Waist
评论详情: My daughter loved it.

As a tall mid-sized person, it’s super hard for me to find clothes. Since my kids were born I’ve been a size 16/XXL as I don’t like anything to cling to my tummy.  This dress was very flattering and a good length for me, plus the pattern was ideal for our fall family photos.
Colors are different than as pictured on site. Pretty but not what I was looking for. Runs large.

Love the length, the skirt is flowy but has a comfortable & flattering stretchy cinch around the ribs. The long sleeves are a light weight fabric that makes it not too hot or too cold. Also is double lined in the skirt and love that the top of the dress is stretchy so it can fit many cup sizes. Material quality feels like I can get many wears out of it too. Can’t wait to get this in other colors.
Size large (usually a 12-14) fit perfectly. It is so cute & flattering. Makes a girl feel pretty!
Love how this dress flows and doesn’t wrinkle! It has such a fun print. I wore it to a dinner party and felt so comfortable in it. Highly recommend!

I love the pattern and colors of the dress, however the sleeves were comically large on me. I have a soft belly and this dress accentuated it making me look pregnant. So bummed as it is a cute dress, just not a good fit for my 5’2 146 lb self.
I love this colorful dress! It is just as pretty in person as I had hoped! Fits me perfectly and I can’t wait to wear it!
So cute, flattering, love the way the neckline fits. Cute and sexy without showing too much leg or boob.
Cute dress just too short

I bought the dress for my nieces wedding.  It was a hot day & the dress was breathable.  I received lots of compliments . I felt like the sleeves were a little too baggy in size but overall I liked the length, it was comfortable , and flattering especially the chest area.  It was a great value for the price .

评论概述: Good quality but the style is not well-suited to my body type
评论详情: I really wanted to love this dress. The print is beautiful and vibrant and the material is very good quality. Unfortunately, I think it's best suited for someone who is tall and thin. I'm 5'3", 145lbs and the dress just isn't flattering on me. The sleeves are far too long and it looks a bit frumpy. That's not the dress's problem though - I think it could probably be really stunning on someone with a different body shape. I will say that the sleeves are not only really long, with they are REALLY wide, almost like batwings. So although this dress wasn't a winner for me, I can attest to the excellent quality and beautiful print.

Beautiful dress, I ordered it to wear to a baby shower this weekend unfortunately I am returning it. Opened the package it smelled/reeked of perfume, and there is a stain on the front. Somebody wore it then returned it. Otherwise I would’ve kept it will not be ordering from this company again.
Cute dress. True to size. Easy to wash and does not wrinkle. Would recommend.

评论概述: Not flattering on me and sleeves were too long
评论详情: The dress was not flattering on me. Also the sleeves were too long. The sleeves needed to be tighter. It did fit true to size and it was comfortable to wear. For reference I’m wearing the size small and I’m 5”2 and 110lbs in the photo.
Love the print and fit of this dress! Wore it to a wedding and received a ton of compliments. Great for work and special occasions!

I ordered this dress to wear for fall. The material is thin enough for warmer fall days. I’m 5’1 and the dress hits me right at the top of my knees. It’s a little more low cut than I expected, but it’s not showing too much cleavage. The arms are a bit long and baggy, but this seems like the style of the dress. Overall the fit is true to size but slightly large. If in between sizes, size down.
Super comfortable and flattering. Fits true to size!  Washes well and doesn't wrinkle as long as you take it out of the dryer promptly.  Nice pattern and super soft.  Love it!

My wife had high hopes for this dress, but she did not like it at all when she put it on.  She is larger chested, so the pattern with her large chest did not work.  The material is a bit clingy too, and if there is any static in the air, it would just be stuck on her.  Such a bummer it didn't work.
The dress is well made and true to size, the waist didn't sit quite right for me because I'm tall - but love the dress otherwise!

While the color is as shown in the picture and very beautiful, the fabric itself it awful. This dress is stiff and not flowy at all. The fabric is like sandpaper and does not feel good on your skin. The seams are scratchy and stick out. There is an elastic around the shoulders that is uncomfortable.  This dress is cute in the photo but does not come as described.

I love this dress!  It is exactly as pictured, a rich warm red with vibrant white flowers.  The length is great, I was worried it would be too short because I'm tall, but it covers well.  The bust has elastic, which is great for us busty girls.  The material is soft, but thick and lined. Would definitely recommend!
Super cute!  Love the printed coral color and with a jean jacket it's my new go to!
I was able to wear this beautiful and flattering dress to my sister’s bridal shower this past weekend. It was comfortable and elegant! The material is great and looks more expensive than it is!
This is a light and airy sundress and feels great to wear.

This dress is my favorite; I want one in every color! The flowy sleeves and empire waist are very flattering. The length stops just above my knee; perfect for Spring, Summer, and Fall. The fabric is very comfortable and breathable.
This is a cute dress, fit true to size. I returned because the coloring just didn’t look good with my complexion. But would recommend!

I LOVE this dress. I got the multi-colored pattern and it has stunning peaches, greens, and teal in it. The cut is so flattering and feminine and the sleeves are actually long enough on me and have an elegant billow-ness to them. I'm 6'0 and a size 14. The XL fits very nicely and comes to about my knee length-wise. SO happy with this item!
really cute flowy dress. It was a nice design on it and the fabric is nice. It's a great fall dress and it fits well and is the perfect length.
Cute dress!  But the neckline is cut way lower than what is shown.  Still work appropriate but if you have a larger chest this might not be the dress for you!

Talk about versatile! You could wear this to the office (which I will), wear with cowboy boots for a concert or rodeo (yep) or where with espadrilles for a beach look (triple whammy). The material has a structure to it vs. being T-shirt like. It has a built in lining which is also a nice touch and still flutters when you move. The colors go great with my fair skin.
This looks way better on than hanging. I love the shape of the waist. It is super flattering. I like the pattern as well. It is a very pretty and comfortable dress.

I was excited about this dress. I was a bit confused though...one pic showed a v-neck and another a plunging neckline.  The fabric is great. The length is perfect. The pattern is gorgeous.  However, the deep plunge coupled with my bust size makes it impossible for me to comfortably wear this dress in public. And I'm not a prude by any stretch of the imagination.  And maybe it would be awesome for someone with less décolletage or more confidence in flaunting "the girls."  But for me, this is a no-go. I wish both pictures had been accurate or the v-neck pic was removed so I could have known full well what I was buying. (In which case, I wouldn't have...)

I really like this dress - it’s nice thick material and good quality.  The only thing I don’t like is its low cut so I will have to wear a tank top under it for work.  I thought the elastic neckline was gonna be kinda weird but it’s ok and is comfortable.  I like the length (I’m 5’5”) and its true to size (I normally wear 12/14).  The color is really nice and bright so could definitely wear this in the spring with sandals or fall with booties!  Recommend this one!!
So cute and comfy. If between sizes you can size down. Very pretty print
My favorite thing thatI took on vacation! Packs great! Washes great! Light,fun, and flirty! Very flattering! Priced so well!
This dress is the perfect piece for transitioning from summer to fall. The print is beautiful and the length is perfect!

PROS: Nice botanical look, great fit and nice feeling quality soft print materials with good stitching. CONS: Fit perfect when ordering one size smaller than normal, which works well if you're short.  Enjoy!

I ordered this in the multicolored fabric and absolutely love it!  The colors make it perfect for fall.  The skirt is lined and a good length.  The fit is great and true to size.  I am excited to wear this dress this fall with boots.  I definitely recommend this dress!

评论概述: Cute dress and skirt is lined
评论详情: Well made, cool and light weight and modest enough to wear out in the sun.  It has a light fabric lining like a slip under the skirt.  Easily will fit multiple sizes.  I would normally wear a XXL but this is generously sized as the size chart shows.  XL fits great.  Stretchy, super comfortable and pretty.

I was skeptical about the style, but am obsessed with the way it fits! Comfy and flowy, but hugs at your natural waist for a slimming effect. The colors pop against the black background. Would absolutely buy again!

评论概述: Lightweight dress with sleeves, perfect for nights out
评论详情: I ordered this dress in the red color.  I go between an XL and an XXL in most Amazon clothes, at a size 16-18.  This dress in an XL does fit, I like the ribbing in the waist that stretches nicely.  Its a little tight for my comfort, but it is still wearable.  I love the fact that it has full sleeves, it means I can wear this in the fall or winter months paired with tights and a sweater.  Thank goodness it has pockets too!  Its a really cute dress.  Its described as being for a wedding, I would consider this for a beach wedding, or a more casual setting.  I find it more appropriate for a nice night out, or a barbecue, or a birthday party.  The material is lightweight and I like the print very much.
